name: Nathan Morgan: Dilemma
description:
NATHAN MORGAN: DILEMMA

Nathan Morgan: Dilemma is a single-player detective game. Detective Nathan Morgan, stationed in the state, is assigned to follow the trail of the mysterious murder at the Bennett mansion. Our goal is to find the killer by making use of the clues.

FIND THE CLUES

Try to find clues around you, they will help you find the killer.

QUESTION THE SUSPECTS

The information you get from the suspects is very important. As a detective, keep these in mind.

FIND THE KILLER

Put together all the information you've collected and decide who the killer is!
